channel.title: history on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in history on Barefoot Rob

item.title: mt3 history
item.description: 21:52 Friday 08 June 2018 JST I started a channel on YouTube for my latest passion project: Marble Track 3, which is being built to show people exactly how to make a marble track out of wooden sticks and glue. It all started 10+ years ago when I showed Marble Track 2 to the world. https://mt2.robnugen.com/ As you can see in the comments, trolls were like “you wasted 6 months of your life!
